A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Failed Character development/expenditure.  Too many plot holes.  Failed follow up on all set ups from the previous movie.  Failed closure to Luke\, Admiral Akbar....etc.  Snoke... was set up well\, but they failed to come through... WHO IS SNOKE!?  Benicio del Torro's character was well played (I think he is an amazing actor) but was so limited.  Who is this new smuggler/slicer character...? I am truly disappointed in this film and I hated it.
